hero.title: Ranks & Progression
hero.intro: Our ranks describe how we support each other. Leadership keeps the halls reliable, middle leaders guard culture & momentum & members grow through presence, kindness & shared community.

progression.title: Progression
body: Progression reflects consistent conduct & community presence over time. Short bursts matter less than repeatable habits.
Questions & small issues start with middle leadership. Hall leaders handle hall-wide needs. Vice leaders coordinate across halls. Long-term direction & policy rest with the guild leader.

senior.title: Senior Leadership
senior.description: Top leaders responsible for the well-being of members & the overall vision & direction of the guild.

ranks.name: Guild Leader
body: A leader is the core vision & direction of the guild. The members are the body & without them, there is no guild.

ranks.name: Vice Leader
body: The vice leader is the guild's right hand, supporting the leader & stepping in when needed. They help coordinate across halls & ensure the guild's vision is executed effectively.

ranks.name: Hall Leader
body: Hall leaders are responsible for the well-being of members within their hall. They oversee daily operations, support middle leadership & ensure a positive environment for all members.

middle.title: Middle Leadership
middle.description: Team leaders responsible for directly leading guild teams & responding to issues that arise within the guild.

ranks.name: Dharmapala
body: Dharmapala are the core of middle leadership, the guardians of the guild's culture & daily pace.

ranks.name: Lotus Warden
body: Lotus Wardens are the first line of support for members, helping with onboarding, answering questions & keeping the guild's culture alive through daily interactions.

ranks.name: Petal Keeper
body: Petal Keepers are the consistent presence in the guild, supporting members through consistent participation, helpful presence & kind conduct. They help maintain a positive environment for all members.

members.title: Members
members.description: The heart of Mōchirīī. Member ranks are observed through consistent participation, conduct & contribution over time.

ranks.name: Mochi Blossom
body: Mochi Blossoms are the veterans of the guild before entering into leadership roles. They have been around long enough to see the guild through multiple seasons & they have contributed to the guild's culture & community in meaningful ways.

ranks.name: Young Bamboo
body: Young Bamboo are the third rank of members, they've been around a while, have contributed to the guild with room still left to grow into long term veterans.

ranks.name: Softwind
body: Softwind are the second rank of members, they have been around long enough to get a feel for the guild's culture & community, but they are still in the early stages of their journey with room to grow into veterans.

ranks.name: Rice Sprout
body: Rice Sprout is the first rank of members, they are new to the guild but have shown potential through their participation & conduct. They are in the early stages of learning the guild's culture & community.
